title: Emily Ratajkowski cracks a rare smile in double-denim while doting on pup Colombo in NYC dog park
text:
Inamorata founder Emily Ratajkowski showed her softer side while doting on her beloved fur-baby Colombo at a dog park near Manhattan's SoHo neighborhood on Thursday.

The 28-year-old DNA Model couldn't help but crack a rare smile as she watched her German shepherd puppy interact with the other dogs and dog owners.

The London-born SoCal native originally adopted her 'good boy' on May 11, and he's been trained by Kaelin Munkelwitz.

Puppy love! Inamorata founder Emily Ratajkowski showed her softer side while doting on her beloved fur-baby Colombo at a dog park near Manhattan's SoHo neighborhood on Thursday

Teeth! The 28-year-old DNA Model couldn't help but crack a rare smile as she watched her German shepherd puppy interact with the other dogs and dog owners

For her 'mother-son' outing, Emily - who relies on stylist Emma Morrison - donned a double-denim casual ensemble with expensive-looking white kitten-heeled boots.

Ratajkowski wore a blue-jean jacket lined with shearling over a black turtleneck, a silver belt, and darker blue jeans.

The Fyre Festival paid promoter scraped her brunette locks into a messy top bun as she texted away on her iPhone.

The Brett Kavanaugh protester appeared to be make-up free beneath her classic Ray-Ban wayfarers.

Kisses: The London-born SoCal native originally adopted her 'good boy' on May 11, and he's been trained by Kaelin Munkelwitz

Texas tuxedo: For her 'mother-son' outing, Emily - who relies on stylist Emma Morrison - donned a double-denim casual ensemble with expensive-looking white kitten-heeled boots

Unflattering: Ratajkowski wore a blue-jean jacket lined with shearling over a black turtleneck, a silver belt, and darker blue jeans

Glued to her phone: The Fyre Festival paid promoter scraped her brunette locks into a messy top bun as she texted away on her iPhone

Crossing the street: The Brett Kavanaugh protester appeared to be make-up free beneath her classic Ray-Ban wayfarers

Last week, Emily - who boasts 31.6M social media followers - tweeted a behind-the-scenes on set snap alongside her 'favorite assistant, Colombo.'

Since 2017, Ratajkowski has kept busy running Inamorata, a swimwear brand which has since branched out into athleisurewear.

When Inamorata launched, designer Lisa Marie Fernandez sent the UCLA drop-out a cease-and-desist letter accusing her of copying her Leandra bikini and multi-bow Triple Poppy maillot from 2015.

Missing from the Lying and Stealing actress' side on Thursday was her husband, Sebastian Bear-McClard.

Squeeee! Last week, Emily - who boasts 31.6M social media followers - tweeted a behind-the-scenes on set snap alongside her 'favorite assistant, Colombo'

'I live in these bodysuits': Since 2017, Ratajkowski has kept busy running Inamorata, a swimwear brand which has since branched out into athleisurewear (pictured Wednesday)

Other half: Missing from the Lying and Stealing actress' side on Thursday was her husband, Sebastian Bear-McClard (pictured Saturday)

The married couple of 20 months appeared to have a whirlwind romance, but they've reportedly shared the same friend group for years.

The 32-year-old Film Independent John Cassavetes Award nominee produced Uncut Gems starring Adam Sandler and Judd Hirsch, which hits US theaters December 25.

Earlier this month, Sebastian promoted the Safdie Brothers' critically-acclaimed crime dramedy - boasting 94% on Rotten Tomatoes - at the New York Film Festival.

Hitting US theaters December 25! The 32-year-old Film Independent John Cassavetes Award nominee produced Uncut Gems starring Adam Sandler (pictured) and Judd Hirsch
description: The 28-year-old DNA Model showed her softer side while bonding with her beloved fur-baby
